title: Is Michigan Gov. Whitmer Building an Electrified Fence Around Her Residence?
subtitle: Conservatives decried the governor’s planned security upgrade after she opposed U.S. President Donald Trump’s costly border wall.
author: Nur Ibrahim
vclaim: Michigan Gov. Gretchen Whitmer — who has previously spoken out against the U.S. border wall with Mexico — is getting security upgrades at her official residence that include an 8-foot-tall, electrified fence.
